wikipedia_page.main: Alexandra Teague is an American poet. Her book, Mortal Geography won the 2009 Lexi Rudnitsky Prize and the 2010 California Book Award for Poetry. Teague was awarded a 2011 National Endowment for the Arts Literature Fellowship. She graduated from Southwest Missouri State University, and from the University of Florida, with an M.F.A. Teague is an associate professor at the University of Idaho. She helped organize Writers Resist Hate.” She read at Get Lit 2017.
